spell.name: Shocking Bolts
entries: Tendrils of purple-white lightning burst from your hand to envelop a creature within range. The target must succeed on a DEX save or take 1d10 lightning damage. If the target is wearing metal armor or is made of metal, it has disadvantage on this save.
This spellâ€™s damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).

spell.name: Bane Blade
entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and you channel negative energy through your strike to weaken the target. The first time the target makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw before the start of your next turn, it must roll a d4 and subtract the value from its roll.
This spell's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 necrotic damage to the target. This damage increases by 1d8 at 11th level and 17th level.
